nodes.short_description:
BlackForge est le simulateur de fabrication d'armes ultime en VR ! Incarnez un forgeron et fabriquez des épées puissantes et des outils de qualité en aiguisant votre savoir-faire dans une forge mystique.

Affûtez votre art et répondez aux demandes des villageois dans une campagne complète. Étudiez les techniques mythiques de vos aînés, forgez le métal, sculptez le bois et canalisez le pouvoir des Aesir dans votre marteau antique pour créer des armes épiques dignes des plus braves héros.

BlackForge: A Smithing Adventure is the ultimate VR weaponsmithing simulator! Become a legendary blacksmith, crafting mighty blades and impeccable tools as you hone your trade in a mystical forge.

Hone your craft and fulfill the requests of townspeople in a full campaign. Study the mythical techniques of the elders, forge metal, shape wood, and channel the power of the Aesir into your ancient hammer to create epic weapons worthy of the bravest heroes.

BlackForge ist die ultimative VR-Schmiedesimulation! Werde zum legendären Schmied, stelle mächtige Klingen und meisterhafte Werkzeuge her, während du dein Können in einer mystischen Schmiede verfeinerst.

Verfeinere dein Können und erfülle Aufträge von Dorfbewohnern in einer kompletten Kampagne. Erlerne die mystischen Techniken der Ältesten, schmiede Metall, forme Holz und erfülle deinen Hammer mit der Kraft der Aesir, um epische Waffen zu schaffen, die eines wahren Kriegers würdig sind.

궁극의 VR 무기 제작 시뮬레이터, BlackForge: A Smithing Adventure 를 소개합니다! BlackForge에서는 전설적인 대장장이의 삶을 확인할 수 있습니다. 신비로운 대장간에서 거래 실력을 연마하면서 강력한 검과 흠잡을 데 없는 장비를 제작하세요!

캠페인을 하나하나 진행하며 실력을 기르고 마을 사람들의 의뢰를 해결하세요. 또한 선조의 신비로운 기술을 연구하고, 금속을 벼려내고, 나무를 조각하고, 여러분의 고대 망치에 에시르 신의 힘을 불어넣어야 합니다. 용감무쌍한 영웅에게 걸맞은 위대한 무기의 제작은 이제 여러분의 손에 달렸습니다!

BlackForge es el simulador de herrería definitivo. Conviértete en una leyenda de la herrería forjando espadas poderosas y herramientas impecables a medida que mejoras tu oficio en una fragua mística.

Perfecciona tus talentos y atiende las peticiones de los pobladores en una campaña completa. Estudia las técnicas míticas de los sabios, forja metal, talla madera y canaliza el poder de los Aesir a través de tu martillo ancestral para forjar armas épicas dignas de los héroes más valientes.

「BlackForge: A Smithing Adventure」は究極のVR武器鍛冶シミュレーターだ！伝説の鍛冶屋となり、神秘的な空間の鍛冶場で腕を磨きながら、強靭な刃や完璧な道具を作り上げよう。

フルキャンペーンで腕を磨き、町の人々の要望に応えよう。長老たちの神業を習得し、金属を鍛え、木を彫り、古代のハンマーにアース神族の力を注ぎ込んで、勇敢な英雄にふさわしい偉大な武器を作り上げよう。

nodes.long_description:
BlackForge is the ultimate VR weaponsmithing simulator! Become a legendary blacksmith, crafting mighty blades and impeccable tools as you hone your trade in a mystical forge.

Hone your craft and fulfill the requests of townspeople in a full campaign. Study the mythical techniques of the elders, forge metal, shape wood, and channel the power of the Aesir into your ancient hammer to create epic weapons worthy of the bravest heroes.

DEEP, APPROACHABLE WEAPONSMITHING
VR allows BlackForge to go deeper than any other weaponsmithing game before it. Shape and smooth wood on the workbench, or heat metal in the forge and then summon thunder into your hammer to beat it into shape. Be as creative as you like by putting personal touches on each weapon. Accessible tutorials make the game easy to pick up and get started with.

HONE YOUR CRAFT IN A FULL CAMPAIGN
BlackForge has a full campaign in which you’ll take on requests from townspeople across the world. You’ll complete increasingly intricate tasks from the surrounding towns. Once you’ve mastered all the new tricks and techniques taught to you in one area, you’ll move on to the next with a new set of missions and skills to learn. 

CHARMING FANTASY ADVENTURE
Travel to the lands you’ve always dreamed of and immerse yourself in the quaint, quiet life of the blacksmith. Relax in your rustic abode, meet new characters, and don’t forget to pet your adorable spirit, nestled in the center of the forge.
